articles.description: Sales momentum is crucial for developers, who have been facing liquidity challenges and below par valuations for their projects, making it tough for them to raise capital.
articles.content: BENGALURU: Residential sales in Mumbai, Indias most valuable property market, saw a sharp surge in December ahead of the increase in stamp duty, effective 1 January.During the month, around 19,220 un… [+2287 chars]

articles.author: J. Jagannath
articles.title: FinMin appoints Milliman Advisors for valuing LIC ahead of IPO - Mint
articles.description: Govt plans to sell minority stake in the insurance behemoth and list it on the bourses. It has already appointed Deloitte and SBI Caps as pre-IPO transaction advisors
articles.content: New Delhi: Finance Ministry has selected Milliman Advisors LLP India as the Reporting Actuary to derive the embedded value of Life Insurance Corporation (LIC) ahead of its IPO. DIPAM Secretary Tuhin … [+1458 chars]

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Tata-Mistry row: Tax tribunal suo moto junks negative remarks on Cyrus Mistry - Economic Times
articles.description: In the two-page corrigendum, the tribunal says, the error happened as para 37 in the first order had to be numbered as 47 on page 60. Accordingly, para 37 stands now substituted as 47 and all remaining paras are renumbered as 48 to 67, instead of 38 to 57.
articles.content: Mumbai: In an unprecedented move, the Mumbai bench of the income tax appellate tribunal (ITAT) has retracted the critical remarks it made on Cyrus Mistry in its recent order that restored the tax-exe… [+4637 chars]

articles.title: Zomato delivered 22 biryani orders per minute in 2020. Viral post - India Today
articles.description: Zomato has released information through memes on how "India ordered this year" in a new post on social media.

articles.title: US Nurse Tests Positive Over A Week After Receiving Pfizer Vaccine: Report - NDTV
articles.description: A 45-year-old nurse in California tested positive for COVID-19 more than a week after receiving Pfizer Inc's coronavirus vaccine, an ABC News affiliate reported on Tuesday.
articles.content:
The health worker tested positive for COVID-19 the day after Christmas, the report said.
